title: Vaaya En Veera Song Lyrics Kanchana 2
stanzas:
raapagala azhudhachu
kannu rendum vaadi pochu.
naapadhu naal vidinjaachu
thurumbena ezhachachu
Aasa  noi aradhaya….

vaaya en veera
kannu kuliyi kuliyi
kaanji kedakudhu.
vaaya en veera
nenju vali vali konjam
maranji pogudhu

vaaya en veera
kannu kuliyi kuliyi
kaanji kedakudhu.
vaaya nee vaaya
mayil thogai mele malaiyai pole

moochu kaathula maaradha pola
vaa vaa vaa
Maarbodu paanjiko
konjam saanjiko
enna menjiko.. nidhaanama.

Rasave un rosa poovum naandhane
nenjil enna vedhachiko
konjam odachiko
enna valachiko.. thaaraalama

neelaadho nee enai
theendum nimishangal
nooru jenmam ponal enna
nee dhaan en sondham

vaaya en veera
kannu kuliyi kuliyi
kaanji kedakudhu.
vaaya en veera
nenju vali vali konjam
maranji pogudhu

vaaya en veera
kannu kuliyi kuliyi
kaanji kedakudhu.
vaaya nee vaaya
mayil thogai mele malaiyai pole

kaarthigai pochu maargali aachu
pani kaaththum anal pole
kodhikudhe, nadhi thudikudhe
pari thavikudhe
vaaya machan.

paavai paavam yaaruku laabam
puyalodu elapola usurodudhe.
onnu koodave
unna thedudhe
ooyaama thaan.

vazhaadhey poongodi
kaatre varudaamal
vinveliye, vaanavil pol
unnal maradho..

vaaya en veera
kannu kuliyi kuliyi
kaanji kedakudhu.
vaaya en veera
nenju vali vali konjam
maranji pogudhu

vaaya en veera
kannu kuliyi kuliyi
kaanji kedakudhu.
vaaya nee vaaya
mayil thogai mele malaiyai pole

seo.title: Vaaya En Veera Song Lyrics Kanchana 2
seo.description: Get the complete Vaaya En Veera Song Lyrics Kanchana 2 from Kanchana 2. Read the lyrics penned by Ko Sesha and composed by Leon James and sung by Shakthisree Gopalan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Ko Sesha, Kanchana 2, Leon James, Shakthisree Gopalan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
